original_title: France’s finest bread maker reads Daily Mirror after arrival
original_body_lines: Darshan Selvaraj, who has been awarded the contract to supply his bakery products to the French President's House for a period of one year after being elected as the best "Baguette" bread producer in France in 2023, arrived at the Bandaranaike International Airport this morning.
While at the airport Mr. Selvaraj was seen reading his article which was published in the Daily Mirror newspaper.
Selvaraj, a resident of the Thellipalai area of Jaffna, came to the country along with his two children and his wife for a three-week visit to Sri Lanka. Pix by T.K.G. Kapila
